title: Valid Anagram
description: Given two strings s and t, return true if t is an anagram of s, and false otherwise.   Example 1: Input: s = "anagram", t = "nagaram" Output: true Example 2: Input: s = "rat", t = "car" Output: false   Constraints: 1 <= s.length, t.length <= 5 * 104 s and t consist of lowercase English letters.   Follow up: What if the inputs contain Unicode characters? How would you adapt your solution to such a case?
constraints: s and t consist of lowercase English letters.
